text: The Piomba is an Italian river in Abruzzo. The source of the river is near Cermignano in the province of Teramo. The river flows southeast past Cellino Attanasio before entering the province of Pescara. The river flows close to the border with Teramo before it enters the Adriatic Sea north of the mouth of the Saline and south of Silvi. ==References== Category:Rivers of the Province of Teramo Category:Rivers of the Province of Pescara Category:Rivers of Italy Category:Adriatic Italian coast basins
title: Piomba
